hero.title: Beyond Service. Beyond Expectation.
hero.subtitle: The world's most exclusive concierge service for those who expect nothing less than extraordinary.

features.label: Our Services
features.title: Sovereign
features.subtitle: We blend state-of-the-art cryptographic security with the warmth of hyper-personalized service.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All communications are secured with sovereign-grade encryption. Your requests, itinerary, and financial data remain visible only to you and your dedicated private liaison.

curation.title: Bespoke Curation
curation.description: Our specialists anticipate your needs before you articulate them, curating options based on your preferences and historical patterns.

liquidity.title: Global Liquidity
liquidity.description: Multi-currency global payment solutions. Secure instant transfers for art auctions, real estate, or charter deposits without banking friction.

biometric.title: Biometric Zero-Trust Access
biometric.description: Passwordless authentication. Voice recognition and biometric verification ensure that only you can authorize high-value transactions or access sensitive itinerary details.

security.label: Sovereign Security
security.title: Your Privacy,
security.subtitle: In a world of data breaches and surveillance, Aurelia operates on the principle of absolute discretion. Our security architecture is designed for those who demand nothing less than impenetrable privacy.

aes.title: 256-bit AES Encryption
aes.description: Military-grade encryption protects all communications and data at rest.

zeroKnowledge.title: Zero-Knowledge Architecture
zeroKnowledge.description: We cannot access your data. Only you hold the decryption keys.

swiss.title: Swiss Data Residency
swiss.description: Your information is stored in secure Swiss data centers, beyond jurisdictional reach.

privacy.title: End-to-End Privacy
privacy.description: From request to fulfillment, your activities remain completely confidential.

experiences.label: Private Access
experiences.title: The Unattainable,
experiences.subtitle: Aurelia secures what others cannot. From competitive bidding on rare vintage timepieces to last-minute gala access in Monaco. Our network bypasses waiting lists and opens closed doors.
experiences.benefit1: Direct negotiation for off-market real estate.
experiences.benefit2: Private aviation management with tarmac transfers.
experiences.benefit3: Curated art acquisition and secure storage.

q1.question: What is the membership fee structure?
q1.answer: Aurelia operates on an annual retainer model. The Sovereign tier begins at $150,000 annually, which includes unlimited concierge requests, a dedicated private liaison, and access to our global network. The Legacy tier, designed for family offices, is structured individually based on scope and complexity.

q2.question: How does the application process work?
q2.answer: Membership is by invitation or application only. After submitting your initial inquiry, our vetting team conducts a discrete background review. Qualified candidates are invited for a private consultation—either in person at our Geneva headquarters or via secure video. The entire process typically takes 2-3 weeks.

q3.question: What services are included in the membership?
q3.answer: Our services span luxury travel and aviation, real estate acquisition, art and collectibles procurement, exclusive event access, private security coordination, and bespoke lifestyle management. Every request is handled with absolute discretion by your dedicated liaison team.

q4.question: How do you ensure privacy and security?
q4.answer: Security is foundational to Aurelia. We employ 256-bit AES encryption for all communications, zero-knowledge architecture for data storage, and biometric authentication for sensitive transactions. Our Swiss data residency ensures your information remains beyond jurisdictional reach.

q5.question: What is your response time for requests?
q5.answer: Standard requests receive acknowledgment within 60 seconds, 24/7/365. Complex acquisitions or travel arrangements typically see initial options within 4-6 hours. For time-sensitive situations, our priority protocol ensures immediate escalation to senior liaisons.

q6.question: Can I use Aurelia services globally?
q6.answer: Absolutely. Our network spans 120+ cities across six continents. Whether you require a last-minute reservation in Tokyo, property viewing in Monaco, or private aviation in São Paulo, our local partners ensure seamless execution worldwide.

membership.title: Membership by
membership.subtitle: Aurelia serves a limited global clientele. To maintain our standard of hyper-personalized service, we accept only 50 new members annually.

dashboard.recommendationsDesc: Personalized experiences based on your preferences
